name: DogShoe
description:
Dogs with shoes on their head are extremely underrated. This is but a small tribute to their courage.

Three (and a half) game modes, to hone your DogShoe skills alone or with friends (respect social distancing, homebound friends only).

- Score Attack: Accumulate combos in this Tony Hawk inspired arcade game. Jumping points count as double!

- Versus: Get the ball on the opposing player's barrel.

- Survival: Try to make the opposing player's ball hit the ground, while keeping yours above it.

- Sandbox: Arena for random DogShoeing.

Controls:

P1: Movement (ASD) and Jump (Space Bar or Left Shift)

P2: Movement (Arrows) and Jump (NumPad 0 or Right Shift)

Tileset: City, by Ludicarts

Shoe: Air Jordans, by ackrmnn

Music: 3 Pound Universe, by Doxent Zsigmond

Follow me on twitter: @Scharma17
